translation.en: Welcome to the Lucky Strike program.
translation.zh: 欢迎参加《幸运大抽奖》

translation.en: Welcome back to the world of the living.
translation.zh: 欢迎你重返阳间

translation.en: -[indistinct PA announcement] -So?
translation.zh: 呼叫贝克医生

translation.en: [echoing] Good morning, Tessa. I'm Dr. Sarkisian.
translation.zh: 早上好 泰莎 我是萨基希安医生

translation.en: You've been in a very bad car accident.
translation.zh: 你出了严重的车祸

translation.en: You ruptured your heart due to trauma,
translation.zh: 外伤导致你的心脏破裂

translation.en: which we were forced to repair surgically.
translation.zh: 我们不得不进行手术修补

translation.en: Tessa?
translation.zh: 泰莎？

translation.en: Morning.
translation.zh: 早上好

translation.en: -Morning. -I made pancakes.
translation.zh: -早上好-我做了煎饼

translation.en: Oh, I'm sorry. I'm gonna go shoot photos.
translation.zh: 哦 抱歉 我要去拍照片

translation.en: Oh, it's so cold outside.
translation.zh: 哦 外面很冷

translation.en: Yeah, I just don't want to miss the morning light.
translation.zh: 是啊 我不想错过晨光

translation.en: Well, maybe when you're back, we could do a little research for colleges.
translation.zh: 要么等你回来 我们一起研究一下报考哪所大学

translation.en: All right. Bye.
translation.zh: 好的 再见

translation.en: She hides behind that camera.
translation.zh: 她总是躲在照相机后面

translation.en: She's not taken a single picture of us.
translation.zh: 她从来没有给我们拍过照片

translation.en: You're too pretty. You'd break her lens.
translation.zh: 你太漂亮了 会靓瞎她的镜头

translation.en: Hey, I told you. You've gotta let her come to you.
translation.zh: 我告诉过你 你得让她主动接近你

translation.en: It's been a year.
translation.zh: 已经一年了

translation.en: Signing a piece of paper doesn't make us her parents.
translation.zh: 签个文件并不代表我们是她的父母

translation.en: Actually it does.
translation.zh: 实际上就是

translation.en: ♪ Teenage headache dreams ♪
translation.zh: （浪漫二月《巴黎野玫瑰》） （《尼基塔》）

translation.en: You open, Sherman? I am for you, Tessa.
translation.zh: -你们开门了吗 薛曼？-你来就开门了 泰莎

translation.en: Um, I think I'm a little short.
translation.zh: 我觉得还差一点

translation.en: That's no crime. I'm only 5'6".
translation.zh: 我觉得还差一点 这又不是什么罪过 我才1米68

translation.en: Enjoy the show.
translation.zh: 观影愉快

translation.en: Sherman, where are the subtitles?
translation.zh: 薛曼 没字幕吗？

translation.en: You watch. I'll translate.
translation.zh: 你接着看 我来翻译

translation.en: "It's the first time we've met in daylight."
translation.zh: 这是我们第一次在白天见面

translation.en: "But you're very early."
translation.zh: 但你来得很早

translation.en: I think I'm just gonna go tell the theater owner.
translation.zh: 我还是去跟影院老板说一下

translation.en: I mean, there's nothing he can do about it. They obviously sent him the wrong print.
translation.zh: 其实你什么都做不了很明显他们送错了拷贝

translation.en: I can get my money back.
translation.zh: 我要退钱

translation.en: I've seen this film before. I don't think you want to miss it.
translation.zh: 我看过这部电影我觉得你不想错过的

translation.en: Does it have a happy ending?
translation.zh: 它是大团圆结局吗？

translation.en: No. Definitely not.
translation.zh: 不是 绝对不是

translation.en: Okay. Then I'll stay.
translation.zh: 好吧 那我留下来

translation.en: "You gonna eat all that chili yourself?"
translation.zh: 你要一个人吃掉所有的辣椒？

translation.en: "In this heat, you're mad."
translation.zh: 这么热的天？不会吧

translation.en: "I eat chili no matter how hot it is, Betty."
translation.zh: 不管多热我都要吃这个辣椒 贝蒂

translation.en: -[both speaking French] -"Those bastards." "What?"
translation.zh: 那些混蛋 什么？

translation.en: "Never mind. Kiss me."
translation.zh: 算了 吻我

translation.en: "Those bastards. How could they do this to you?"
translation.zh: 那些混蛋 他们怎么能这样对我？

translation.en: I'm sorry. How long was I doing that?
translation.zh: 对不起 我抓着你的手多久了？

translation.en: I lost feeling about an hour ago, so I'm not sure.
translation.zh: 一小时前我的手就麻了所以我不确定 你为什么不说？

translation.en: -Why didn't you say something? -Um, the movie is a bit of a downer, so…
translation.zh: 你为什么不说？ 这部电影有点伤感 所以…

translation.en: It's a love story. [sniffles]
translation.zh: 这是个爱情故事

translation.en: I mean, not all love stories are downers.
translation.zh: 不是所以的爱情故事都伤感

translation.en: All the good ones are.
translation.zh: 佳作都是伤感的

translation.en: Romeo and Juliet, Anna Karenina,
translation.zh: 《罗密欧与朱丽叶》 《安娜·卡列尼娜》、《英国病人》

translation.en: -The English Patient. -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 《安娜·卡列尼娜》、《英国病人》

translation.en: I think it's the ending of a relationship,
translation.zh: 我觉得爱人的分离

translation.en: that's what makes a love story so memorable.
translation.zh: 是爱情故事让人难忘的原因

translation.en: What about Pride and Prejudice?
translation.zh: 那《傲慢与偏见》呢？《简爱》？

translation.en: Jane Eyre? Those both have happy endings.
translation.zh: 那《傲慢与偏见》呢？《简爱》？ 都是大团圆结局

translation.en: That's only because the writer chose to end their love stories prematurely.
translation.zh: 那只是因为作家选择早早结束他们的爱情故事

translation.en: Wow. That is a really interesting way
translation.zh: 哇 你这种死不认错的方式

translation.en: of not admitting you're wrong.
translation.zh: 倒是挺有意思的

translation.en: Come on! Okay. Picture this.
translation.zh: 少来了 好吧 想想这样

translation.en: Picture that Leonardo DiCaprio didn't die at the end of Titanic.
translation.zh: 想象一下莱昂纳多·迪卡普里奥在《泰坦尼克号》结尾没有死

translation.en: -Do I have to? Oof. -You have to.
translation.zh: -一定要这样吗？-一定要

translation.en: Jack Dawson is a jobless, penniless gambler,
translation.zh: 杰克·道森是个无业又身无分文的赌徒

translation.en: who possessed, at best, marginal artistic talent.
translation.zh: 只有 最多 那么一点点艺术才能

translation.en: -He saved Rose's life. -Right, of course.
translation.zh: 他救了萝丝的命 对 当然但他还对萝丝展开了爱情攻势

translation.en: But he also love-bombed her and stole her away from her fiancé.
translation.zh: 对 当然但他还对萝丝展开了爱情攻势 把她从未婚夫那里抢走

translation.en: And poor Rose was just so hypnotized by that steamy car sex
translation.zh: 那次激情车震让可怜的萝丝鬼迷心窍

translation.en: that she really thought that he'd give her a life of passionate adventure?
translation.zh: 她真的以为 杰克会让她过上充满激情的冒险生活

translation.en: Please, come on. That's a life of abject poverty and dehumanizing infidelity.
translation.zh: 拜托 少来了 那是一种非常贫苦 没有人性的通奸生活

translation.en: Titanic 2. If you thought part one was a disaster…
translation.zh: 《泰坦尼克号2》如果你觉得第一部是灾难…

translation.en: Oh, my gosh.
translation.zh: 哦 我的天啊

translation.en: -I-- -[Sherman] Time to go!
translation.zh: -我…-该走了

translation.en: Jesus, this guy is getting a one-star review, for sure.
translation.zh: 天呐 我肯定要给这家伙一星差评

translation.en: So, um, how did you get so good at speaking French?
translation.zh: 你的法语怎么这么好？

translation.en: My dad is a foreign languages professor.
translation.zh: 我爸爸是外语教授

translation.en: So by the time I was 12, he had me fluent in French, Spanish and Italian.
translation.zh: 所以我12岁的时候 他已经让我可以流利地说法语、西班牙语和意大利语了

translation.en: Oh! Oh, my gosh.
translation.zh: 我的天啊

translation.en: If I could just read Dante's Inferno in the original Italian,
translation.zh: 如果我能读懂意大利原文的但丁《地狱》

translation.en: -my life would be complete, I think. -I get that a lot.
translation.zh: 那我的生活就圆满了 -经常有人这么对我说-真的？

translation.en: -Really? -No. No, I've never gotten that before.
translation.zh: 不 从来没人这么对我说过

translation.en: That's some pretty old gear you got there. You don't shoot digital?
translation.zh: 你的装备都旧了你不用数码照相机吗？

translation.en: No, I don't. I get a much higher dynamic range on film.
translation.zh: 是的 我不用用胶卷拍能得到更高的动态范围

translation.en: Plus, I'm also kind of addicted to the smell of the developing chemicals.
translation.zh: 而且我对冲印化学药水的气味也很上瘾

translation.en: The fumes make me a little delirious. [laughs]
translation.zh: 那种气味让我神魂颠倒

translation.en: Kind of like what your eyes are doing to me right now.
translation.zh: 就像你的眼睛现在看着我的反应

translation.en: Ooh.
translation.zh: 哦

translation.en: That…
translation.zh: 那…

translation.en: -That was really cheesy. -No, no.
translation.zh: 那真是太土了 不会的 就是

translation.en: It was… It was…
translation.zh: 不会的 就是

translation.en: a little cheesy, yeah.
translation.zh: 有点土 对

translation.en: It sounded perfect in my head.
translation.zh: 在我脑海里听起来很完美

translation.en: Oh, okay. Then let me imagine that for a sec, okay.
translation.zh: 好的 让我想一下

translation.en: -Still bad? -It's worse, actually.
translation.zh: -还是很糟？-其实更糟了

translation.en: Somehow, I don't know.
translation.zh: 不知为何 我不知道

translation.en: Um, I should probably… Yeah, me too.
translation.zh: -我该走了-嗯 我也是

translation.en: Um, thank you for letting me
translation.zh: 谢谢你让我在三个小时内

translation.en: whisper in your ear for three hours.
translation.zh: 谢谢你让我在三个小时内 对着你的耳朵窃窃私语

translation.en: You are welcome.
translation.zh: 不客气

translation.en: -Skylar. -What?
translation.zh: -斯凯勒-什么？

translation.en: My name is… It's Skylar.
translation.zh: 我的名字？斯凯勒

translation.en: I'm Tessa.
translation.zh: 我叫泰莎

translation.en: Maybe I'll see you here again sometime.
translation.zh: 也许下次还能在这里见到你

translation.en: Yeah, I'd like that.
translation.zh: 是的 我也想

translation.en: Oh! My jacket.
translation.zh: 哦 我的外套

translation.en: Sky. You're alive!
translation.zh: 斯凯 你还活着？

translation.en: Come on. I want to show you something.
translation.zh: 来吧 我想给你看样东西

translation.en: Sky!
translation.zh: 斯凯？

translation.en: Bad dream.
translation.zh: 做恶梦了？

translation.en: You called out his name.
translation.zh: 你叫了他的名字

translation.en: It's called a visitation dream. We see lots of 'em around here.
translation.zh: 这叫做托梦 在这里经常发生

translation.en: It's all part of the grieving process.
translation.zh: 都是悲伤过程的一部分

translation.en: I know. It just felt like Skylar was really here.
translation.zh: 我不知道 感觉像斯凯勒在这里

translation.en: -Doris would love to hear about that. -Who's Doris?
translation.zh: 我打赌桃乐丝一定很想听听 桃乐丝是谁？

translation.en: A patient writing a book on the afterlife.
translation.zh: 一位病人 写了关于来世的书

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: The other day, she offered to read my aura.
translation.zh: 有一天她说要解析我的灵气

translation.en: I politely declined.
translation.zh: 我礼貌地拒绝了

translation.en: -What is that? -Your belongings from the crash.
translation.zh: -这是什么？-你的物品 车祸现场找到的

translation.en: They closed the accident report already?
translation.zh: 他们已经结案了吗？

translation.en: Well, neither driver had drugs or alcohol in their system.
translation.zh: 司机不是酒驾也不是毒驾

translation.en: That's usually the end of it.
translation.zh: 通常都是这种结局

translation.en: They never even interviewed me.
translation.zh: 他们都没给我录口供

translation.en: You said you didn't remember anything about the accident?
translation.zh: 你说过车祸的事情你完全不记得了？

translation.en: -I don't. -Maybe that's for the best.
translation.zh: 是的 也许这样最好

translation.en: [Dr. Sarkisian] I'm very encouraged, Tessa.
translation.zh: 我很受鼓舞 泰莎

translation.en: The scan shows your right ventricle is functioning quite well, despite the tear.
translation.zh: 尽管有撕裂扫描显示你的右心室功能正常

translation.en: Finally, some good news.
translation.zh: 终于有好消息了

translation.en: It is more than good.
translation.zh: 是非常好的消息

translation.en: Ninety-nine out of 100 with this same injury die on my table.
translation.zh: 受过这种伤的人有99%死在了我的桌子上

translation.en: I did die.
translation.zh: 我的确死了

translation.en: Only for a short time.
translation.zh: 只有一小段时间

translation.en: I could see Skylar.
translation.zh: 但我看到了斯凯勒

translation.en: Like, he was in this… this crazy white light.
translation.zh: 他在很亮的白光下…

translation.en: What is that? Was she, you know, hallucinating?
translation.zh: 那是怎么回事？她出现幻觉了吗？

translation.en: When the body undergoes severe trauma…
translation.zh: 当身体遭受创伤

translation.en: -[heartbeat thumping] -…the hypothalamus can flood the brain
translation.zh: 下丘脑可以让大脑充满止痛的内啡肽

translation.en: -with pain-relieving endorphins. -[Vickie] So when can we take her home?
translation.zh: 下丘脑可以让大脑充满止痛的内啡肽 -我们什么时候能带她回家？-本周末

translation.en: [Dr. Sarkisian] End of the week.
translation.zh: -我们什么时候能带她回家？-本周末

translation.en: Tessa needs to be extremely careful these next few months.
translation.zh: 接下来的几个月泰莎需要非常小心

translation.en: Any chest pains or shortness of breath,
translation.zh: 有任何胸痛或呼吸急促症状马上拨打急救电话

translation.en: you call 911 immediately. Understand?
translation.zh: 有任何胸痛或呼吸急促症状马上拨打急救电话 明白吗？

translation.en: Jazz? Just give me a second.
translation.zh: 贾丝 稍等一会儿

translation.en: Jazz?
translation.zh: 贾丝？

translation.en: [Skylar] You watch, I'll translate.
translation.zh: 你接着看 我来翻译

translation.en: [PA announcement] X-ray tech to ICU. Any available X-ray tech to ICU.
translation.zh: X光技师至重症监护室我们需要X光技师至重症监护室

translation.en: Hi, excuse me. Are you Doris?
translation.zh: 嗨 不好意思 你是桃丽丝吗？

translation.en: [exhales] I am going to take a wild guess here.
translation.zh: 等等 让我先大胆猜测一下

translation.en: Room B424, girl with the broken heart?
translation.zh: B424房 心脏破碎的女孩

translation.en: [laughing] Relax.
translation.zh: 放轻松

translation.en: I'm not psychic. Jasmine told me you might come looking for me.
translation.zh: 我不是灵媒 贾丝敏说你可能会来找我

translation.en: Oh.
translation.zh: 哦

translation.en: My condolences.
translation.zh: 我深表同情

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Are your hands injured?
translation.zh: 你的手受伤了吗？

translation.en: Excuse me?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: From the accident. Did you hurt your hands at all?
translation.zh: 车祸造成的？ -你的手受伤了吗？-没有 为什么这么问？

translation.en: -No, why? -Ta-da! Huh?
translation.zh: -你的手受伤了吗？-没有 为什么这么问？

translation.en: Oh, come on. Come on. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 哦 快点

translation.en: So, what is your book about?
translation.zh: 你的书是讲什么的？

translation.en: It's about ADC's.
translation.zh: 讲死后通灵的

translation.en: After Death Communication.
translation.zh: 就是死后沟通

translation.en: Okay, so you believe that dead people can contact us?
translation.zh: 好吧 所以你相信死人能联系我们？

translation.en: Along with billions of other peoples
translation.zh: 和世界上数十亿

translation.en: from faiths that span the globe.
translation.zh: 其他有不同信仰的人一起

translation.en: Sometimes, the departed,
translation.zh: 有时候死者

translation.en: they call out to us in voice.
translation.zh: 他们用声音呼唤我们

translation.en: And other times, we can smell their cologne or perfume in the air.
translation.zh: 有时候我们能在空气中闻到他们的 香水味

translation.en: No matter how they communicate, the message is the same.
translation.zh: 不管他们怎么沟通 传递的都是同一个信息

translation.en: "I'm still here."
translation.zh: “我还在这里”

translation.en: "And your grief, like a beacon, calls me to your side."
translation.zh: “你的悲伤 就像灯塔 召唤我到你身边”

translation.en: And when the separation has been traumatic,
translation.zh: 当分离让人觉得痛苦难忘

translation.en: like with you and your boyfriend,
translation.zh: 就像你和你男朋友

translation.en: there's often unfinished business.
translation.zh: 通常是还有事情没有完成

translation.en: Like regrets or something?
translation.zh: 比如有遗憾？

translation.en: Like things left undone or unsaid.
translation.zh: 比如有事情没做完 或者有话没说出口

translation.en: -[door opens] -[Vickie] Tessa. We signed you out. It's time to go.
translation.zh: 泰莎 出院证明我签过字了 该走了

translation.en: He's in the in-between.
translation.zh: 他正处在生死之间但不会在那里待太久

translation.en: But he won't be there for long, a few weeks at most.
translation.zh: 他正处在生死之间但不会在那里待太久 最多几个星期 等他再往前走

translation.en: And when he moves on…
translation.zh: 最多几个星期 等他再往前走

translation.en: he's gone for good.
translation.zh: 他就永远消失了

translation.en: -I gotta go. -Oh, wait, wait.
translation.zh: 我得走了 哦 等等

translation.en: Here, take this. It's my first book.
translation.zh: 带上这个 这是我的第一本书

translation.en: -It's a good place to start. -That's okay.
translation.zh: -用这本书入门很不错-不用了

translation.en: He's reaching out to you.
translation.zh: 他在联系你

translation.en: Reach back.
translation.zh: 回复他

translation.en: It's too late for that.
translation.zh: 太迟了

translation.en: [teacher] Tessa, you're up.
translation.zh: 泰莎 轮到你了

translation.en: Um, this is a photo that I took back in February.
translation.zh: 这是我二月拍摄的一张照片

translation.en: Is that how you spend your free time, taking pictures of trees?
translation.zh: 你就是这样消磨时间吗？拍树的照片？

translation.en: Well, it's actually not a tree, asshole.
translation.zh: 实际上不是树 混蛋

translation.en: -[class laughs] -It's a cell phone tower, disguised as a tree.
translation.zh: 这是一座伪装成树的手机信号塔

translation.en: It is an allegory for the artificiality of modern life.
translation.zh: 讽喻现代生活都是人造的

translation.en: It's a lovely photo, Tessa.
translation.zh: 那张照片拍得很好 泰莎

translation.en: Your technical skills have taken huge leaps this year.
translation.zh: 今年你的摄影水平有了很大提高

translation.en: Oh, thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: I know you're still a junior, but I think you have a good shot of getting into the Rhode Island School of Design.
translation.zh: 我知道你还是大三但你可以考上罗德岛设计学院

translation.en: I'd be happy to write you a letter of recommendation.
translation.zh: 我可以帮你写推荐信

translation.en: Thank you. I just-- My work's not ready for that yet.
translation.zh: 谢谢 要申请那所学校我的作品还没准备好

translation.en: Oh? What do you feel is missing?
translation.zh: 哦？你觉得缺少了什么？

translation.en: Just like a point of view. You know, something to say that's my own.
translation.zh: 一种观点 我自己的想法

translation.en: Well, maybe it's time for your subject matter to evolve.
translation.zh: 也许是时候深化一下你的主题

translation.en: After all, there is something notably missing from all your photos.
translation.zh: 毕竟你所有的照片都明显缺了点东西

translation.en: Yeah, I know. Color.
translation.zh: 对 我知道 色彩

translation.en: No. People.
translation.zh: 不是 人物

translation.en: You know, Tessa, before an artist can find her voice, she has to find a subject she loves.
translation.zh: 在艺术家表达自己的观点之前她必须找到自己热爱的主题

translation.en: Who or what do you love, Tessa?
translation.zh: 你热爱的人或事物是什么？

translation.en: [Skylar] I should probably… Yeah, me too.
translation.zh: -我该走了-嗯 我也是

translation.en: ♪ Let's get older tonight ♪
translation.zh: （疯狂三月！《惊魂记》、《致命诱惑》） （愚人四月！《空前绝后满天飞》） （《反斗智多星》）

translation.en: Hey, okay. What do you think?
translation.zh: 嘿 好的 你觉得怎么样？

translation.en: -Red? -Noisy colors are trendy.
translation.zh: -红色？-喧闹的颜色很时髦

translation.en: I don't know. I feel like you're kind of taking advantage of your dad's niceness.
translation.zh: 我不知道 我觉得你是在利用你爸的善良

translation.en: Of course, I am. My dad is putty when I get straight A's.
translation.zh: 我当然在利用他只要我成绩全优 他愿意做任何事

translation.en: Hey, yo, Tess!
translation.zh: 泰丝？

translation.en: -Hi, Cortez. -Hey, uh, do you have plans this weekend?
translation.zh: 嗨 柯蒂斯 这个周末有安排吗？

translation.en: As it happens, I actually work as Tessa's full-time scheduler,
translation.zh: 真巧 我是泰丝的全职日程安排员

translation.en: so I can say, with absolute authority,
translation.zh: 所以我说的话算数

translation.en: that she does not have any plans this weekend.
translation.zh: 她没有任何安排

translation.en: What are you saying? What are you doing?
translation.zh: 你在说什么？你在做什么？

translation.en: Well, the final crew meet of the season is this Saturday.
translation.zh: 好吧 本赛季最后一场赛艇比赛在周六举行

translation.en: I was kind of wondering if you'd come out and take some photos.
translation.zh: 你要来拍照吗？

translation.en: Uh, sorry. I don't really do sports photography.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我不拍体育类的照片

translation.en: But if you glue a selfie stick to your forehead, it might be the same thing.
translation.zh: 如果你把自拍棒粘在额头上效果可能也一样

translation.en: Will Judd be there?
translation.zh: 贾德会去吗？

translation.en: Well, wherever I go, my rowing partner goes, so…
translation.zh: 我去哪里 我的赛艇搭档就去哪里 所以…

translation.en: Then we'll be there.
translation.zh: 那我们会去

translation.en: "We" will be there?
translation.zh: 我们？我们要去？

translation.en: I'll be there as your photo assistant, remember? I'm her photo assistant.
translation.zh: 我会去当你的助理记得吗？我是她的摄影助理

translation.en: Well, the first race starts at 6:30.
translation.zh: 比赛六点半开始 所以…

translation.en: In the morning? He didn't mean morning, did he?
translation.zh: 早上？ -他是说早上吗？-是的

translation.en: [Tessa] Yup, he did.
translation.zh: -他是说早上吗？-是的

translation.en: Do you think Judd can see me from here?
translation.zh: 贾德能看见我吗？

translation.en: -Hey! -You are fired. Give me this.
translation.zh: -嘿-你被解雇了

translation.en: Assistanting is not my thing. My bad.
translation.zh: 我不擅长做助理 我的错

translation.en: You were the one who dragged me out here. So behave, please.
translation.zh: 是你把我拖来的 所以请礼貌一点

translation.en: Ready your marks.
translation.zh: 各就各位

translation.en: Row!
translation.zh: 开始

translation.en: They're pulling ahead!
translation.zh: 他们领先了！

translation.en: -Whoo! Whoo! -Yeah!
translation.zh: 好啊！

translation.en: -[both laughing] -Yes!
translation.zh: 好！

translation.en: [Shannon] You never said he was hot.
translation.zh: 你从没说过他很帅

translation.en: -Yes, I did. -No, you said he was cute.
translation.zh: -不 我说过-你没有 你说过他很可爱

translation.en: Emojis are cute. That guy is like melting my sunglasses, Tess.
translation.zh: 表情符号很可爱 那家伙 把我的太阳镜都融化了 泰丝

translation.en: -I think I'm gonna go. -Are you crazy?
translation.zh: -我要走了 我…-你疯了吗？

translation.en: You've been obsessed about this guy for like months, and you're just gonna ditch?
translation.zh: 你迷恋这家伙好几个月了 你却要溜了

translation.en: -I don't know what to say to him. -"Hold me."
translation.zh: -我不知道跟他说什么-不会吧？

translation.en: He just won the race. Congratulate him.
translation.zh: 他刚刚赢了比赛 恭喜他

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Can I put this on my Story? If you wanna die.
translation.zh: -我能把这个发到社交网站上吗？-除非你想死

translation.en: Tessa! Hey-- Oh!
translation.zh: 泰莎！出…

translation.en: -Oh, my God! Sorry. -Whoa, whoa!
translation.zh: -哇-哦 我的天 抱歉 我的…

translation.en: My legs are always Jell-O after races.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我的… 我的腿比赛后总是会软

translation.en: I can't believe that you're a…
translation.zh: 我不敢相信你是…

translation.en: A jock?
translation.zh: 运动健将？

translation.en: A jock, yeah!
translation.zh: 运动健将 对

translation.en: Jocks don't speak Spanish, French and Italian.
translation.zh: 运动健将不会说西班牙语、法语和意大利语

translation.en: -Hey, this one does. -Well, they definitely don't read
translation.zh: 这个就会说 他们绝对不会读简·奥斯汀和艾米莉·布朗特的书

translation.en: Jane Austen and Emily Brontë.
translation.zh: 他们绝对不会读简·奥斯汀和艾米莉·布朗特的书

translation.en: -I have a thing for happy endings. -Skylar!
translation.zh: 我喜欢大团圆结局 斯凯勒

translation.en: Oh, shit. Here we go. Um…
translation.zh: 该死 来了

translation.en: That is what I call a finish.
translation.zh: 我就说你能赢的

translation.en: -Um… -Movie theater girl.
translation.zh: 影院姑娘

translation.en: -Her name is Tessa. -How did you…
translation.zh: 她叫泰莎 你怎么…

translation.en: The blue eyes. Skylar went on and on about them.
translation.zh: 蓝眼睛 斯凯勒一直提起

translation.en: Wow, Mom! Does anyone see a deep, dark hole I can crawl into?
translation.zh: 哇 妈妈 我… 有没有人看到一个黑洞我可以钻进去的？

translation.en: [Leigh] He spent weeks searching for you on the Internet.
translation.zh: 他花了好几周在网上搜索你

translation.en: Mom…
translation.zh: -妈妈-他没找到你的半点信息

translation.en: [Leigh] He couldn't find a thing about you.
translation.zh: -妈妈-他没找到你的半点信息 我故意隐瞒自己的信息

translation.en: -Well, that is by design. -[phone ringing]
translation.zh: 我故意隐瞒自己的信息

translation.en: Told you. She's analog. Like me.
translation.zh: 跟你说过 她是老年人做派 跟我一样

translation.en: [sighs] Your father is driving me crazy.
translation.zh: -你父亲把我逼疯了-跟他聊聊

translation.en: Talk to him, Mom. Tell him-- Tell him I won.
translation.zh: -你父亲把我逼疯了-跟他聊聊 -告诉他我赢了-你以后可以自己跟他说

translation.en: No. You can talk to him yourself later.
translation.zh: -告诉他我赢了-你以后可以自己跟他说

translation.en: Are you going to be heading back to Edison tonight?
translation.zh: -你要回爱迪生市吗？-不

translation.en: No, I'm gonna be staying at Grandpa Mike's. Um…
translation.zh: 我要住在迈克外公家

translation.en: But first, I was gonna see if Tessa maybe wanted to go…
translation.zh: 但首先我想知道 也许泰莎想要去…

translation.en: Chill out and hang?
translation.zh: 一起玩？

translation.en: [softly] Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 哦 我的天呐

translation.en: Movie theater girl would love -to chill out and hang. -[Leigh chuckles]
translation.zh: 影院姑娘很想出去玩

translation.en: -All right. Bye. -Thanks.
translation.zh: -好的 再见-谢谢

translation.en: -[footsteps departing] -Thank you, Mom.
translation.zh: 谢谢 那是我妈妈

translation.en: That's my mom. She does, uh, parties.
translation.zh: 谢谢 那是我妈妈 她很风趣

translation.en: I can put the top up if you want.
translation.zh: 你想的话我可以把顶棚盖起来

translation.en: [laughing] No, it's okay. It feels really good.
translation.zh: 不 没关系 感觉很好

translation.en: [sighs] You look amazing.
translation.zh: 你看起来真美

translation.en: Say it in French.
translation.zh: 用法语说

translation.en: You too.
translation.zh: 你也是

translation.en: You don't have a girlfriend, do you?
translation.zh: 你有女朋友吗？

translation.en: No. Not since the eighth grade. Why?
translation.zh: 没有 八年级以后就没有了为什么问这个？

translation.en: This kinda looks like you.
translation.zh: 看起来你有

translation.en: [laughs] No. That is, uh… That's my mom and dad when they were teenagers.
translation.zh: 那是我父母年轻的时候

translation.en: Oh!
translation.zh: -哦-是的

translation.en: Yeah, this is actually the same Jeep that my grandpa bought my mom for her 18th birthday.
translation.zh: 这辆吉普我妈妈18岁生日时我外公买给她的生日礼物

translation.en: You can actually see it behind them in the photo.
translation.zh: 那张照片就是买车后的合影

translation.en: Oh, yeah! They're so cute. They look so in love.
translation.zh: 哦 是啊 他们好可爱 -他们看起来很相爱-对 曾经很相爱

translation.en: -Yeah, they were. -"They were"?
translation.zh: -他们看起来很相爱-对 曾经很相爱 -曾经？-现在也相爱

translation.en: Are. They are.
translation.zh: -曾经？-现在也相爱

translation.en: My dad's just living and teaching in Oregon right now.
translation.zh: 我爸爸现在在俄勒冈州生活和教书

translation.en: That's pretty far. Are they, like, taking a break or something?
translation.zh: 相距很远 他们在分居吗？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不是

translation.en: They're gonna be fine. They talk almost every day, so…
translation.zh: 他们会没事的他们几乎每天都聊 所以…

translation.en: Some music.
translation.zh: -我有一些音乐-哇

translation.en: -Whoa! -If you wanna take a look.
translation.zh: 想看看吗？

translation.en: [gasps] What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: Yeah, it's my mom's entire high school playlist.
translation.zh: 这是我妈妈整个高中的歌单

translation.en: New Order. Kate Bush.
translation.zh: 新秩序、凯特·布什

translation.en: Echo and the Bunnymen. Your mom's like my new bestie.
translation.zh: 回音与兔人乐队你妈妈就是我的新闺蜜

translation.en: -Your dad made her a mix tape? -Yes, he did.
translation.zh: -你爸爸给她做的歌曲集锦？-是的

translation.en: Can I play it?
translation.zh: 我能放出来听吗？

translation.en: -It's the other way. -[both chuckle]
translation.zh: 翻过来

translation.en: -It's okay. I won't tell the '80s police. -Shut up.
translation.zh: 没关系 我不会告诉80年代的警察 闭嘴

translation.en: I have spent every summer of my life down here with my grandfather.
translation.zh: 我每年夏天都会来和外公一起过

translation.en: How have I never heard of this place?
translation.zh: 我每年夏天都会来和外公一起过 我怎么没听说过这里？

translation.en: Well, that's my favorite part about taking photos.
translation.zh: 我拍照片最喜欢的就是这一点

translation.en: It's like you just stumble and wander and find places like this.
translation.zh: 你漫无目的地闲逛 发现这样的地方

translation.en: Right. But what… what drew you to this spot specifically?
translation.zh: 太好了 但是什么具体的原因吸引你来这里？

translation.en: The view.
translation.zh: 景色

translation.en: That view.
translation.zh: 那边的景色

translation.en: It was called The Empyrean.
translation.zh: 它叫做天庭

translation.en: It was a honeymooners' resort back in the '60s.
translation.zh: 上世纪60年代的蜜月度假村

translation.en: It's so surreal. It's unbelievable.
translation.zh: 太超现实了 难以置信

translation.en: You've gone in there?
translation.zh: 你去过那里？

translation.en: Unarmed?
translation.zh: 手无寸铁？

translation.en: I'll do anything for a great photo.
translation.zh: 为了拍出好照片 我什么都愿意做

translation.en: "Empyrean"? Um…
translation.zh: 天庭

translation.en: That's where Dante meets God, right?
translation.zh: 那是但丁遇见上帝的地方 对吧？

translation.en: Highest of all heavens. A place of pure love.
translation.zh: 天堂的最高处 纯爱之地

translation.en: Look at it. If that's not a metaphor for love, then I don't know what is.
translation.zh: 看看它 如果这不是爱情的隐喻我不知道是什么了

translation.en: Can I see your photos?
translation.zh: 我能看看你的照片吗？

translation.en: They're not on my phone. I don't shoot digital, remember?
translation.zh: 我手机上没有我不拍数码照片 记得吗？

translation.en: Well, how do people see your work?
translation.zh: 那别人怎么欣赏你的作品？

translation.en: I don't show it, unless I have to for class.
translation.zh: 我一般不展示 除非课上有要求

translation.en: How come?
translation.zh: 为什么？

translation.en: 'Cause I'm not good enough yet.
translation.zh: 还不够好

translation.en: I find that seriously difficult to believe.
translation.zh: 我觉得这很难让人信服

translation.en: Okay, so if you won't show me your photos,
translation.zh: 好吧 如果你不让我看你的照片

translation.en: -maybe give me a tour. -Of the Empyrean?
translation.zh: 也许你可以带我转转 -去天庭？-对 带我去

translation.en: Yeah, show it to me.
translation.zh: -去天庭？-对 带我去

translation.en: I wanna see it, you know, through your eyes.
translation.zh: 我想去看看 你知道 透过你的双眼

translation.en: ♪ 'Cause we all have wings ♪
translation.zh: （爱之地）

translation.en: Do you know how to waltz?
translation.zh: 你会跳华尔兹吗？

translation.en: -Not at all. -Okay, just step back this way.
translation.zh: -完全不会-很好 这只脚后退

translation.en: -Okay. -And then your back foot forward.
translation.zh: -好-然后那只脚向前

translation.en: And then it's like one, two, three. Straighten your leg.
translation.zh: 然后就是一、二、三 所以你就一

translation.en: One, two, three.
translation.zh: 二、三

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: And then you have to put your chin up and then lead.
translation.zh: 然后你要抬起下巴 微微的

translation.en: Like you don't want to pay any attention to the other person. -Don't slip. -[both laughing]
translation.zh: 好像你不关注对方 随便吧

translation.en: Do you want to see what it's like to be inside of a camera?
translation.zh: 你想看看在照相机里面是什么感觉吗？

translation.en: -Yeah. -Okay. Close the door.
translation.zh: -嗯？-关门

translation.en: It works just like a camera lens. I kind of made it myself.
translation.zh: 这就像是照相机镜头 我自己做的

translation.en: Whoa.
translation.zh: 哇

translation.en: It's beautiful.
translation.zh: 好漂亮

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 嗯

translation.en: I mean, it's pretty good, right?
translation.zh: 吹得很好 不是吗？

translation.en: Ooh, I mean, it's obvious you just haven't been playing that long.
translation.zh: 我是说 很明显你会吹没有多久

translation.en: -Just three years. -Oh.
translation.zh: 就三年 哦

translation.en: Should have heard me back then.
translation.zh: 你应该听听我当年怎么吹的

translation.en: Can you hear them?
translation.zh: 你听得到它们吗？

translation.en: Hear who?
translation.zh: 听到谁？

translation.en: The ghosts of newlyweds past.
translation.zh: 新婚夫妇的鬼魂

translation.en: No. What are they saying?
translation.zh: 没有 它们说什么？

translation.en: Well, the groom, he's saying…
translation.zh: 新郎 他说…

translation.en: [in deep voice] Come on, honey.
translation.zh: “快点 宝贝”

translation.en: You've been in the bathroom for two hours now.
translation.zh: “你在洗手间待了两个小时了”

translation.en: It's time to come to bed. You're my wife.
translation.zh: “该上床了 你是我妻子”

translation.en: What does the bride say?
translation.zh: 新娘怎么说？

translation.en: Well, the bride is saying, um…
translation.zh: 新娘说…

translation.en: But you haven't even kissed me yet.
translation.zh: “但你还没亲过我”

translation.en: -Okay. -You want me to walk you to your door
translation.zh: 好了 要我送你到门口吗？

translation.en: so your parents don't think I'm a… taxidermist?
translation.zh: 这样你父母不会以为我是动物标本剥皮师？

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: Or like someone-- a serial killer?
translation.zh: 或者觉得我是连环杀手？

translation.en: That's okay. Um, they're not my parents, actually.
translation.zh: 没关系 其实他们不是我的父母

translation.en: I, uh… I'm just a genetic stranger that lives under their roof.
translation.zh: 我只是一个熟悉的陌生人跟他们住在一起

translation.en: "A genetic stranger"?
translation.zh: 熟悉的陌生人？

translation.en: Yeah, it's, uh… It's a long story.
translation.zh: 对 说来话长

translation.en: For another time.
translation.zh: 下次再说

translation.en: When can I see you again?
translation.zh: 我什么时候能再见到你？

translation.en: Um, well, when are you back in Avalon?
translation.zh: 你什么时候回阿瓦隆？

translation.en: End of the month. And how long are you gonna be here for?
translation.zh: -月底-你要在这里待多久？

translation.en: The whole summer.
translation.zh: 整个夏天

translation.en: I'm staying with my grandpa until I leave for Brown.
translation.zh: 我跟我外公住一阵然后去布朗大学读书

translation.en: You're going to Brown? What?
translation.zh: 你要去布朗？什么？

translation.en: I just kissed an Ivy League bro?
translation.zh: 我亲了一个常春藤名校生？

translation.en: -[gasps] -[laughs] Your street cred ruined?
translation.zh: 有辱你街头大姐大的名声吗？

translation.en: Only if you tell me that you're also a lifeguard.
translation.zh: 除非你也是救生员

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: -Are you serious? -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 你是认真的吗？

translation.en: About three summers now at Washington Avenue Beach.
translation.zh: 在华盛顿大道海滩当过大概三个夏天的救生员

translation.en: No! Why?
translation.zh: 不会吧 为什么？

translation.en: -Good night. -Good night.
translation.zh: -晚安-晚安

translation.en: Do I need to kick this guy's ass?
translation.zh: 我需要把那家伙揍一顿吗？

translation.en: No, she's just scared.
translation.zh: -不 她只是害怕-为什么？

translation.en: Because she likes him.
translation.zh: 因为她喜欢那家伙

translation.en: [Vickie] Tessa?
translation.zh: 泰莎

translation.en: Shannon's waiting.
translation.zh: 莎伦在等你

translation.en: Okay, I'm coming.
translation.zh: 好的 我来了

translation.en: Hey, what's that?
translation.zh: 嘿 那是怎么回事？

translation.en: That is four A's, one A-minus. Don't want to talk about it.
translation.zh: 得了四个A和一个A减的奖品 不想聊

translation.en: I'm gonna tint the windows, so no one knows it's me inside.
translation.zh: 我打算把车窗搞成黑色这样就没人知道我在里面

translation.en: Geez, stop whining. It's a car.
translation.zh: 天啊 别再抱怨了 一辆车而已

translation.en: So did you call the phone company?
translation.zh: 你打给电信公司了吗？

translation.en: -Yeah. -And?
translation.zh: 打了 -然后呢？-你说得对

translation.en: You were right.
translation.zh: -然后呢？-你说得对

translation.en: They just said that Skylar probably sent the photo before the accident
translation.zh: 他们说斯凯勒可能在车祸前发送了那张照片 然后照片就卡在服务器什么的当中了

translation.en: and then it got stuck in the server or something.
translation.zh: 然后照片就卡在服务器什么的当中了

translation.en: But that doesn't explain why my phone just turned on after it was completely trashed.
translation.zh: 但这并不能解释为什么我的手机完全被撞坏了 还能开机 你能解释一下吗？

translation.en: Can you explain that?
translation.zh: 还能开机 你能解释一下吗？

translation.en: I can't. No.
translation.zh: 我无法解释

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: It's totally normal to read into things.
translation.zh: 睹物思人很正常

translation.en: My mom did the same thing after her sister died.
translation.zh: 我姨妈死的时候我妈也这样

translation.en: Every rainbow was a sign.
translation.zh: 出现每道彩虹好像都有含义

translation.en: Every butterfly was a message from heaven.
translation.zh: 每只蝴蝶都是天堂传来的信息

translation.en: Meet my computer on wheels.
translation.zh: 见见我带轮子的电脑

translation.en: [Shannon] Shit.
translation.zh: 该死

translation.en: Sorry. You put it on my Spotify.
translation.zh: 抱歉 你把它放到我的听歌应用里了

translation.en: It's okay.
translation.zh: 没关系

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: Talk to me, Tess.
translation.zh: 跟我说说 泰丝 就是

translation.en: I can't believe he's gone.
translation.zh: 我不敢相信他走了

translation.en: It's like I close my eyes
translation.zh: 我一闭上眼睛

translation.en: and I see us meeting for the first time.
translation.zh: 就看见我们第一次见面的景象

translation.en: And I remember every word that he said to me.
translation.zh: 我记得他对我说的每一个字

translation.en: I remember every expression on his face.
translation.zh: 我记得他脸上的每个表情

translation.en: And then I open my eyes and it's like…
translation.zh: 然后我睁开双眼 就好像

translation.en: Did I, like, just dream our entire relationship up?
translation.zh: 然后我睁开双眼 就好像 我们的关系都是我想象出来的吗？他是我想象出来的吗？

translation.en: -Did I dream him up? -Hey. I was there.
translation.zh: 我们的关系都是我想象出来的吗？他是我想象出来的吗？ 嘿 我也在现场他不是想象的 好吗？

translation.en: He wasn't a dream, okay?
translation.zh: 嘿 我也在现场他不是想象的 好吗？

translation.en: Your head's just a little scrambled.
translation.zh: 你的大脑有点乱

translation.en: That happens when two tons of metal comes crashing into you.
translation.zh: 当两吨重的金属撞到你就会这样

translation.en: I don't even remember the last thing I said to him.
translation.zh: 我不记得最后对他说过什么

translation.en: -Come on. -I'm serious.
translation.zh: -别这样-我是认真的

translation.en: We were fighting that last week, remember?
translation.zh: 我们上周就为此吵过了 记得吗？

translation.en: Hey. You guys had an epic summer.
translation.zh: 嘿 你们度过了一个美好的夏天

translation.en: -One that you will never forget. -Yeah.
translation.zh: 你永远不会忘记的夏天 嗯

translation.en: Damn, I won't forget it, and I was just a jealous bystander.
translation.zh: 该死 我不会忘记自己只是一个嫉妒的旁观者

translation.en: Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 我的天啊

translation.en: It's my first day back, and I look like a total mess.
translation.zh: 这是我第一天回学校我看起来一团糟

translation.en: Yeah. You do.
translation.zh: 对 很糟

translation.en: -[laughing] -You do, yeah.
translation.zh: 很糟 没错

translation.en: I heard about what happened, Tessa. I'm terribly sorry.
translation.zh: 你的事情我听说了 泰莎 节哀

translation.en: If you were my daughter, I'd tell you to use it.
translation.zh: 如果你是我女儿 我会叫你利用它

translation.en: Use it? The pain, the emptiness.
translation.zh: -“利用它”？-痛苦和空虚

translation.en: Channel it through your camera.
translation.zh: 通过你的照相机传递出来

translation.en: Some of the greatest works of art were produced by intense grief.
translation.zh: 一些最伟大的艺术作品都是在强烈的悲伤中创造的

translation.en: -Okay. -Tessa.
translation.zh: -好-泰莎？

translation.en: RISD portfolio day is right around the corner.
translation.zh: 罗德岛设计学院的作品预审日即将到来

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: [Mel] So that's it?
translation.zh: 所以就这样了？

translation.en: You're just giving up your photography? It sure looks like it.
translation.zh: -你放弃摄影了？-看起来确实是这样

translation.en: This is the same crap your mom used to pull.
translation.zh: 你妈以前就经常这样

translation.en: She'd become obsessed with things. Baking, yoga, pottery.
translation.zh: 她痴迷很多事情 烘焙、瑜伽、陶艺

translation.en: One day, lose interest, move on to the next.
translation.zh: 某天失去兴趣 又去寻找下一个东西

translation.en: That's why she could never get any traction in life.
translation.zh: 所以她一辈子都没有取得任何成功

translation.en: Are you done?
translation.zh: 你说完了吗？

translation.en: You think Skylar would have wanted this?
translation.zh: 你觉得斯凯勒想要这样吗？

translation.en: I don't know.
translation.zh: 我不知道

translation.en: Why don't you go ask him?
translation.zh: 你为什么不去问他？

translation.en: I'm still here, Tess.
translation.zh: 我还在这里 泰丝

translation.en: Sky?
translation.zh: 斯凯？

translation.en: -[Vickie] Tess? -I'm sleeping.
translation.zh: -泰丝？-我在睡觉

translation.en: I just did a double shift. You were asleep when I left.
translation.zh: 我走的时候你就在睡 我都值两班了

translation.en: Did you even eat anything?
translation.zh: 你吃过东西了吗？

translation.en: I'm not hungry.
translation.zh: 我不饿

translation.en: Can you please just let me sleep?
translation.zh: 麻烦你能让我睡吗？

translation.en: No. No, no, no, no! No, no, no, no…
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: No, no, no. No, no…
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: Hi.
translation.zh: 嗨

translation.en: -Tessa? -Uh, I gotta talk to Doris.
translation.zh: 泰莎？ -我得跟桃丽丝谈谈-等一下

translation.en: Hang on a second. Let me-- Wait, Tessa.
translation.zh: -我得跟桃丽丝谈谈-等一下 让我…等等 泰莎

translation.en: What-- Her family took her home this morning.
translation.zh: -怎么…-她的家人今早接她回家了

translation.en: There was nothing more we could do. Are you okay, honey?
translation.zh: 我们已经无能为力了你还好吗 亲爱的？

translation.en: Um, I just haven't-- I haven't eaten today.
translation.zh: 我就是今天没吃饭而已

translation.en: -Um-- -You know what, let me check you out.
translation.zh: 知道吗？让我给你检查一下

translation.en: -Why do you need to talk to Doris so bad? -It's just--
translation.zh: 你为什么要找桃丽丝聊聊？ 跟她之前跟我谈过的事有关关于来世的

translation.en: It's about what she was telling me before. It's about the afterlife.
translation.zh: 跟她之前跟我谈过的事有关关于来世的

translation.en: Maybe that old coot isn't so crazy after all.
translation.zh: 也许那个疯婆子其实一点也不疯

translation.en: What do you mean? Your heartbeat is fast, but it sounds healthy.
translation.zh: -什么意思？-你的心跳很快但很健康

translation.en: Wait, what do you-- What were you saying? What do you mean?
translation.zh: 什么？等等你刚才说什么？什么意思？

translation.en: Doris told me you'd come looking for her.
translation.zh: 桃丽丝告诉我你会来找她

translation.en: She even left you something.
translation.zh: 她还给你留了东西

translation.en: Her book.
translation.zh: 她的书

translation.en: Tessa, I have seen a lot of dying and grieving in my time here.
translation.zh: 泰莎 我在这里看过很多死亡和悲伤

translation.en: Looking back never helped anyone.
translation.zh: 沉迷于过去对任何人都没帮助

translation.en: There's either life or there's death.
translation.zh: 不管是生是死

translation.en: There's no place in-between.
translation.zh: 生死之间没有交界

translation.en: I'm gonna find him.
translation.zh: 我要去找他

translation.en: [Doris on video] What does the in-between look like?
translation.zh: 生死之间是什么样子？

translation.en: Well, we as living beings can never imagine it. We have no reference.
translation.zh: 如果没有参照 我们作为活人是无法想象的

translation.en: It would be like trying to describe a sunset to a blind man.
translation.zh: 这就好像跟盲人描述日落的样子

translation.en: Technological advances have made ghost-hunting a legitimate field.
translation.zh: 技术的进步让捉鬼 成为合理存在的领域 我的朋友达琳

translation.en: My friend Darlene, she let me borrow her full-spectrum digital camera.
translation.zh: 成为合理存在的领域 我的朋友达琳 她把全光谱数码相机借给了我

translation.en: This baby can pick up light well beyond the human eye,
translation.zh: 这个小家伙能捕捉到 人眼看不见的光

translation.en: with infrared night vision--
translation.zh: 还有红外夜视功能

translation.en: -[Shannon and Tessa laughing] -[thunder rumbling]
translation.zh: （车祸发生65天前）

translation.en: Well, happy Fourth of July.
translation.zh: 独立日快乐

translation.en: I don't know. I actually kind of like this weather.
translation.zh: 我不知道 我有点喜欢这种天气

translation.en: Don't call me. So, you think this means the fireworks are canceled?
translation.zh: 你觉得这样烟花表演会取消吗？

translation.en: -I think so, yeah. -Yeah.
translation.zh: 我想是的

translation.en: -Hey. -Hey.
translation.zh: -嘿-嘿

translation.en: -You okay? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -你没事吧？-没事

translation.en: Skylar, Tess says you're going to Brown.
translation.zh: 斯凯勒 泰丝说你要去布朗大学

translation.en: -Congrats! -Thank you.
translation.zh: -恭喜-谢谢

translation.en: What are you gonna study?
translation.zh: 你读的是什么专业？

translation.en: -Probably Latin. -That'll come in handy.
translation.zh: 哦 可能是拉丁文 这个专业真实用

translation.en: You never know when you're gonna meet the Pope or something.
translation.zh: 你永远不知道什么时候会见到教皇

translation.en: Or need to conduct an exorcism.
translation.zh: 或者需要进行驱魔

translation.en: Nice. That's nice.
translation.zh: 很好 谢谢 我不知道我只是不想将来后悔

translation.en: I don't know. I just don't want to have any regrets, you know?
translation.zh: 很好 谢谢 我不知道我只是不想将来后悔 我想过不同的生活

translation.en: I wanna live a bunch of different lives.
translation.zh: 我想过不同的生活

translation.en: What's the point of speaking languages if I'm not gonna travel the world and use them, you know?
translation.zh: 如果我不去旅行会说多门语言有什么意义？

translation.en: Let's go.
translation.zh: 我们走

translation.en: We are going to watch the fireworks on TV.
translation.zh: 我们要去看电视上的 烟花表演

translation.en: Do you want to talk about it?
translation.zh: 你想聊聊吗？

translation.en: Not really.
translation.zh: 不太想

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: My mom filed for divorce today.
translation.zh: 我妈今天递交了离婚申请

translation.en: I'm really sorry.
translation.zh: 我真的很抱歉

translation.en: You know, I know this doesn't help right now, but…
translation.zh: 我知道我说这话毫无帮助 但是

translation.en: just because they're splitting up that doesn't mean that they don't care about each other.
translation.zh: 他们分开了并不意味着他们不在乎你 他们…

translation.en: It means they've given up.
translation.zh: 意味着他们放弃了

translation.en: -I don't think that's fair. -Fair to who? You or them?
translation.zh: 那不公平 对谁不公平？你还是他们？

translation.en: [sighs] When you're rowing a race and you get to the last 20 meters…
translation.zh: 赛艇比赛中到了最后20米…

translation.en: your entire body is telling you to stop.
translation.zh: 你的整个身体会叫你停下来

translation.en: Your muscles are on fire. Your lungs are screaming at you.
translation.zh: 你的肌肉火辣辣的你的肺在对你尖叫

translation.en: Everything inside you wants to quit, make the pain go away.
translation.zh: 你的五脏六腑想要退出让这种疼痛感消失

translation.en: But if you want to win,
translation.zh: 但如果你想赢

translation.en: that's exactly when you dig deeper and you row harder.
translation.zh: 那正是你将桨叶插得更深划得更用力的时候

translation.en: You really don't like to let things go, do you?
translation.zh: 你讨厌放任不管 是吗？

translation.en: -You noticed? -[laughs]
translation.zh: 你注意到了

translation.en: You're just starting to make me believe in happy endings.
translation.zh: 你开始让我相信大团圆结局了

translation.en: -Oh, no! The photo! No. -Oh, oh…
translation.zh: 哦 不 照片！ -哦 不 完全毁了-哦 不 怎么了？

translation.en: -What? -It's totally ruined. It's totally ruined.
translation.zh: -哦 不 完全毁了-哦 不 怎么了？ 完全毁了

translation.en: Now you see why I don't let anyone up here.
translation.zh: 现在你知道为什么我不让任何人上来了

translation.en: I am pretty amazed that you've let me into your inner sanctum.
translation.zh: 我很惊讶你让我进了你的内部密室

translation.en: Yeah, well, if you tell anyone,
translation.zh: 如果你告诉任何人

translation.en: I'll poison you.
translation.zh: 我就毒死你

translation.en: Oh, you don't have to…
translation.zh: 哦 你不用…

translation.en: -Hmm? -You don't have to look through that. -No, no, no. Okay. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -对不起 很烂 不 好吧-嗯

translation.en: It's cool.
translation.zh: 很酷

translation.en: I like this one.
translation.zh: 我喜欢这张

translation.en: -That's, um-- -That's a cell phone tower.
translation.zh: -这是…-这是手机信号塔

translation.en: -Yeah. -It's an allegory
translation.zh: 对 这是对

translation.en: for something-- technology co-opting our natural environment.
translation.zh: 某件事的讽喻 技术与自然环境相融合

translation.en: Really?
translation.zh: 真的吗？

translation.en: Really.
translation.zh: 真的

translation.en: I know you hate compliments, but this work is incredible.
translation.zh: 我知道你讨厌夸奖 但这件作品真是太棒了

translation.en: I'm serious. It's like you can see things that no one else can.
translation.zh: 我是认真的 我感觉你能看见别人看不见的东西

translation.en: That just shows how much you know about photography.
translation.zh: 这说明了你不太懂摄影

translation.en: -I mean, I think you can sell this stuff. -Maybe on Etsy.
translation.zh: -我觉得这张你可以拿出去卖-也许放到Etsy网上

translation.en: There is something that's missing
translation.zh: 缺了一点东西

translation.en: from like all of your photos.
translation.zh: 你所有的照片里

translation.en: Yeah, I know. It's color.
translation.zh: 对 我知道 是色彩

translation.en: No. You.
translation.zh: 不 是你

translation.en: I just don't really think the world needs another selfie.
translation.zh: 这个世界不需要多一张自拍了

translation.en: What is wrong with stepping in front of the camera every once in a while?
translation.zh: 别这样 站到 照相机前会怎样？

translation.en: I believe that a photographer should point her lens outward,
translation.zh: 我认为摄影师应该把镜头朝外

translation.en: -toward the world. -Yeah?
translation.zh: 对着全世界 -是吗？-是的 所以你可以尝试去理解世界

translation.en: Yeah, so you can try and understand it.
translation.zh: -是吗？-是的 所以你可以尝试去理解世界

translation.en: What about trying to understand yourself?
translation.zh: 不如去尝试理解自己吧？

translation.en: If you had my past, you wouldn't ask that question.
translation.zh: 如果你知道我的过去你就不会说这种话

translation.en: You ever gonna tell me about it?
translation.zh: 你打算告诉我吗？

translation.en: Come on. I'll walk you home.
translation.zh: 来吧 我陪你走回家

translation.en: I never met my real father. He ran off before I was born.
translation.zh: 我从没见过亲生父亲我出生前他就跑了

translation.en: And my mom…
translation.zh: 然后我妈妈…

translation.en: The kind way to describe her would be flaky.
translation.zh: 说好听点她不靠谱

translation.en: -Wow. -Instead of counting sheep
translation.zh: 哇 我小时候不是数着绵羊入睡

translation.en: to go to sleep when I was a kid,
translation.zh: 我小时候不是数着绵羊入睡

translation.en: I would count her fiancés.
translation.zh: 我数着她的未婚夫入睡

translation.en: And Mel was one of them?
translation.zh: 梅尔就是其中之一

translation.en: Yeah, he was the last one.
translation.zh: 对 他是最后一个

translation.en: Her final victim before she ghosted us for good.
translation.zh: 她永远消失前的最后一个受害者

translation.en: And that's when he took you in?
translation.zh: 那时起他收留了你

translation.en: Well, he tried, but the court,
translation.zh: 他尽力了 但在法庭上对一个想要收养

translation.en: they just didn't really look too kindly on a middle-aged bachelor
translation.zh: 他尽力了 但在法庭上对一个想要收养 年轻女孩的中年单身汉他们真的看起来不太友好

translation.en: wanting to adopt a young girl.
translation.zh: 年轻女孩的中年单身汉他们真的看起来不太友好

translation.en: So then where did you go?
translation.zh: 那么后来你去了哪里？

translation.en: Ah, Family Services. Foster care.
translation.zh: 私人托儿 家庭寄养

translation.en: Oh.
translation.zh: 哦

translation.en: You know how you said that I notice things that no one else does?
translation.zh: 你说过我能注意到别人注意不到的事？

translation.en: When you live with strangers who can hurt you,
translation.zh: 当你和会伤害你的陌生人住在一起

translation.en: and I bounced around a lot,
translation.zh: 我四处搬家

translation.en: you have to really just observe everything.
translation.zh: 就真的必须注意一切事

translation.en: When you're a foster kid, you learn the hard way to…
translation.zh: 当你是一个被收养的孩子你吃了苦头才认识到…

translation.en: Never put your guard down?
translation.zh: 你从来没放松过警惕？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: Anyway, about a year ago, Mel and Vickie got married
translation.zh: 大约一年前 梅尔和薇琪结婚了

translation.en: and then the court let them take me in.
translation.zh: 然后法庭让他们收养我

translation.en: So that's why you call yourself a genetic stranger?
translation.zh: 所以你说自己是熟悉的陌生人

translation.en: -I did that. -[scoffs]
translation.zh: 我干的

translation.en: ♪ She knows that I'm through with that ♪
translation.zh: （想象你在罗德岛设计学院的未来大一新生）

translation.en: ♪ True and kind ♪
translation.zh: （截止日期）

translation.en: ♪ And I will be fine with that… ♪
translation.zh: （作品评审）

translation.en: [Vickie] Good God.
translation.zh: 天啊 今天这么早？

translation.en: -How early is it? -Super early.
translation.zh: 天啊 今天这么早？ 非常早

translation.en: A little splash of almond milk, right?
translation.zh: 加一点点杏仁奶 对吗？

translation.en: Uh, yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: I like your necklace. Yeah? Shannon lent it to me.
translation.zh: -我喜欢你的项链-是吗？莎伦借给我的

translation.en: You know, if you ever want to borrow anything from me,
translation.zh: 你可以问我借东西

translation.en: clothes or makeup, jewelry…
translation.zh: 衣服、化妆品、珠宝

translation.en: All righty.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: I'll see you later, Vick.
translation.zh: 回头见 阿薇

translation.en: See ya.
translation.zh: 再见

translation.en: When a rower dies, this is what heaven looks like.
translation.zh: 赛艇运动员死后 这就是天堂的样子

translation.en: For me, heaven is Paris in the rain. Like cobblestone streets.
translation.zh: 对我来说 天堂就是雨中的巴黎 -鹅卵石街道-是吗？

translation.en: -Yeah? -Yeah. Is everything in black and white?
translation.zh: -是的-一切都是黑白的吗？

translation.en: Get out of my head.
translation.zh: 滚开

translation.en: You ever been? To Paris?
translation.zh: 你去过吗？巴黎？

translation.en: Someday.
translation.zh: 总有一天

translation.en: Avec moi?
translation.zh: 跟我去？

translation.en: I guess I could use a translator.
translation.zh: 我觉得我需要一个翻译

translation.en: My parents had their honeymoon there.
translation.zh: 我父母度蜜月就是去的巴黎

translation.en: So I've been saving up to send them for their 25th anniversary.
translation.zh: 所以我一直在存钱送他们去庆祝25周年纪念日

translation.en: -What if they don't want to go? -I mean, who doesn't want to go to Paris?
translation.zh: 如果他们不想去呢？ 谁会不想去巴黎？

translation.en: Yeah, but what if they don't want to go with each other?
translation.zh: 如果他们不想一起去呢？

translation.en: It's not a crime to fall out of love, you know.
translation.zh: 不爱不是罪过

translation.en: -Tessa. -Hmm? Love never dies.
translation.zh: 泰莎 爱永不死

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: You just sound like someone who's never been hurt by life.
translation.zh: 听你这么说你好像一辈子没被生活伤害过

translation.en: You putting me on notice?
translation.zh: 你在警告我吗？

translation.en: [laughs] No.
translation.zh: 不是

translation.en: Um, what the hell is that?
translation.zh: 那到底是什么东西？

translation.en: This… is a rowboat.
translation.zh: 这个… 是一艘划艇

translation.en: I'm assuming you want me to get in that?
translation.zh: 我猜你是想让我坐进去？

translation.en: -You are getting in this with me. -No.
translation.zh: 你跟我一起坐进去 不要

translation.en: We spent four hours in your darkroom doing what you love to do.
translation.zh: 我们在你的暗房里待了四个小时做你喜欢做的事

translation.en: Let me show you what I love to do.
translation.zh: 让我向你展示一下我喜欢的事

translation.en: -[Tessa] Hands under your… -[Skylar] Thumbs here.
translation.zh: -手放在这个下面-拇指在这里

translation.en: [Tessa] Thumbs there.
translation.zh: -拇指在这里-然后它会变成这样

translation.en: [Skylar] And then it's gonna go simple like that. You press it down.
translation.zh: -拇指在这里-然后它会变成这样 -按下去-好

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: -按下去-好

translation.en: And then you tilt it and then you pull it.
translation.zh: 抵住 然后拉

translation.en: -Hmm. -And then you're pressing down,
translation.zh: -好-然后按下去

translation.en: tilt it, and then pull it.
translation.zh: 让船倾斜

translation.en: -Okay, I'm gonna try and go forward again. -All right. -Don't help me. -I won't.
translation.zh: 好的 我试着让船再次前进 别帮我

translation.en: I won't. You've got this. You've got this.
translation.zh: 我不会的 别担心 你可以的 你可以的

translation.en: [Tessa] Oh, my God! -This is awful. -[Skylar laughs]
translation.zh: 我的天啊 太糟糕了

translation.en: -Oh, I'm tired now. -You're flying!
translation.zh: -我累了-你飞起来了

translation.en: I love you, Tessa.
translation.zh: 我爱你 泰莎

translation.en: We should probably head back, yeah?
translation.zh: 我们应该回去了 对吧？

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: "The in-between"?
translation.zh: 《生死之间》？

translation.en: That's just what Doris calls it,
translation.zh: 桃丽丝是这么称呼的

translation.en: but every culture has their own version of it.
translation.zh: 但每个文化都有不同的说法 所以…

translation.en: So, it's where we go after we die.
translation.zh: 但每个文化都有不同的说法 所以… 我们死了会去那个地方

translation.en: Not me. I'm going to Jamaica.
translation.zh: 不是我 我要去牙买加

translation.en: I'm serious, Shannon. It's like a waiting room for our souls.
translation.zh: 我是认真的 莎伦它就像是我们灵魂的等候室

translation.en: Okay, so you think Skylar is reaching out to you from this waiting room?
translation.zh: 好吧 所以你觉得斯凯勒正在那个等待室里联系你

translation.en: They were color photos, Shannon. I don't… I don't shoot in color.
translation.zh: 它们是彩色照片 莎伦我不拍彩色照片

translation.en: I don't even own the chemicals to develop it.
translation.zh: 我都没有冲洗彩照的化学药剂

translation.en: -But you can't show me the photos? -No, I told you.
translation.zh: 你不能给我看看照片吗？ 不能 我告诉过你了 定影液没用我不知道为什么

translation.en: The fixer didn't work. I don't know why.
translation.zh: 不能 我告诉过你了 定影液没用我不知道为什么

translation.en: But maybe spirits can't be captured on film or something. I don't know.
translation.zh: 但也许胶片捕捉不到灵魂 我不知道

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: Tess, I want to believe you, I swear,
translation.zh: 泰丝 我想相信你 我发誓 但是

translation.en: but messages from the other side?
translation.zh: 来自阴间的信息？

translation.en: I just think he wants the same thing I want.
translation.zh: 我觉得他想要的和我一样

translation.en: To see me one last time so that we can actually say goodbye to each other.
translation.zh: 想见我最后一面这样我们能彼此好好告别

translation.en: You loved him, and he knew that.
translation.zh: 你爱他 他知道的

translation.en: What more is there to say?
translation.zh: 还有什么好说的？

translation.en: [teacher] Two-minute warning.
translation.zh: 两分钟后开考

translation.en: Please take your seats and set your phones to silent mode.
translation.zh: 请坐好 把手机调成静音模式

translation.en: Dude, we need to focus, okay? You're not even listening to me.
translation.zh: -我们需要集中注意力 好吗？-你没在听我说话

translation.en: Yes, I am! I just don't think
translation.zh: 不 我听了 我就是觉得这和彩照

translation.en: this is about color photos or waiting rooms or the in-between.
translation.zh: 我就是觉得这和彩照 等待室或生死之间无关

translation.en: -Then what is it about? -A girl who won't let go.
translation.zh: 那和什么有关？ 一位不肯放手的女孩

translation.en: Just think about it. Okay?
translation.zh: 想想吧 好吗？

translation.en: Sorry.
translation.zh: 抱歉

translation.en: Cell phone use is prohibited during the test!
translation.zh: 考试期间禁止使用手机

translation.en: Didn't I tell you the drive would be worth it?
translation.zh: 我不是跟你说过来一趟值得吗？

translation.en: This negative's made of glass. It's coated in collodion,
translation.zh: 这张照片用的是玻璃底片上面涂了一层火棉胶

translation.en: then dipped in silver nitrate, which is crazy.
translation.zh: 然后浸在硝酸银里这样做很疯狂 因为之后

translation.en: Because after that, you only have a few minutes to take the photo
translation.zh: 然后浸在硝酸银里这样做很疯狂 因为之后 你只有几分钟的时间用来拍照否则化学药剂就会干掉

translation.en: or the chemicals completely dry up.
translation.zh: 你只有几分钟的时间用来拍照否则化学药剂就会干掉

translation.en: Hmm. That's exactly what I was gonna say.
translation.zh: 这就是我想说的

translation.en: It's only ten grand.
translation.zh: 才卖一万块

translation.en: It's a little out of my budget.
translation.zh: 稍微超出了我的预算

translation.en: But I can offer you a gluten-free cracker with rotting cheese on it.
translation.zh: 但我可以给你一块无麸质饼干 上面有腐臭奶酪

translation.en: You're so generous. It's crazy.
translation.zh: -你真慷慨-谢谢

translation.en: Sorry. Am I interrupting?
translation.zh: -太疯狂了-抱歉 我打断你们了吗？

translation.en: No. Julian, hi.
translation.zh: 没有 朱利安 嗨

translation.en: We were just talking about how much we love the photo.
translation.zh: -我们都喜欢这张照片-哦 是啊

translation.en: Oh, yeah. It's wonderful, isn't it?
translation.zh: 很棒 对吧？

translation.en: I just love how he prioritizes mood and atmosphere over subject.
translation.zh: 我很喜欢他把情绪和氛围置于主题之上的方式

translation.en: That is a very sophisticated insight for a girl your age.
translation.zh: 对于你这个年龄的女孩来说这是非常成熟的见解

translation.en: Julian, meet my very sophisticated girlfriend.
translation.zh: 朱利安 见见我非常成熟的女朋友

translation.en: Hi, I'm Tessa. Nice to meet you.
translation.zh: 嗨 我叫泰莎 很高兴见到你

translation.en: -Congratulations on this. This is great. -Oh, thank you.
translation.zh: -恭喜 非常棒-谢谢

translation.en: Okay, kids, follow me. I wanna show you something.
translation.zh: 好的 孩子们 跟我来 我要给你们看样东西

translation.en: Doesn't it look amazing all lit up like this?
translation.zh: 这样看起来是不是很棒像这样全部亮起来？

translation.en: -Like it belongs here? -It does belong here.
translation.zh: 好像它是属于这里的？ 对 它的确属于这里

translation.en: Tessa, you have an extraordinary eye.
translation.zh: 泰莎 你有非凡的眼光

translation.en: I don't understand.
translation.zh: 我不明白

translation.en: It's for sale for $1,000.
translation.zh: 这张照片售价好几千美元

translation.en: Yeah, and we already have two serious inquiries.
translation.zh: 对 我们已经接到两个认真的询价

translation.en: this photo is not for sale.
translation.zh: 这张照片不卖

translation.en: This was a gift to Skylar.
translation.zh: 这是给斯凯勒的礼物

translation.en: Can't you print another one?
translation.zh: 你就不能再洗一张吗？

translation.en: I really don't want anyone looking at it. Can we please take it down?
translation.zh: 我不想让任何人看我们能把它取下来吗？

translation.en: Are you serious?
translation.zh: 你是认真的吗？

translation.en: -Take it down. -Hey, it's okay. I'll take it down.
translation.zh: -拿下来-好 我把它拿下来

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: That's exactly why I brought you here,
translation.zh: 这就是我带你来的原因

translation.en: to prove that your photos are great. Even Julian thinks so.
translation.zh: 证明你的照片很棒 连朱利安都这么想

translation.en: I don't want this photo hanging on the wall of some random stranger.
translation.zh: 我不希望这张照片挂在某个陌生人的墙上

translation.en: This is my photo.
translation.zh: 这是我的照片

translation.en: That means I get to decide who I share it with and I shared it with you.
translation.zh: 我可以决定与谁分享 我和你分享

translation.en: You're right.
translation.zh: 你说得对

translation.en: I'm sorry. I should have asked you first.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我应该先问你的意见

translation.en: I just wanted you to see how amazing you are.
translation.zh: 我想让你看看自己有多棒

translation.en: And that you can get into RISD.
translation.zh: 你有资格就读罗德岛设计学院

translation.en: Who said anything about RISD?
translation.zh: 谁提过罗德岛设计学院的事了？

translation.en: Shannon said your art teacher thought you could get in.
translation.zh: 莎伦说你的美术老师认为你能被录取

translation.en: I'm gonna kill her.
translation.zh: 我要去杀了她

translation.en: It is the best art college in the country.
translation.zh: 这是国内最好的艺术院校

translation.en: And it's in Providence, which is in the same city as Brown.
translation.zh: 而且它在普罗维登斯布朗大学也在那里

translation.en: Which if you get in, we could be together.
translation.zh: 如果你被录取了 我们就能在一起

translation.en: -I-- -For real. Without a ticking clock.
translation.zh: -我…-说真的 不用匆匆忙忙的

translation.en: Even if I could get into RISD,
translation.zh: 就算我进了罗德岛设计学院

translation.en: which I totally doubt,
translation.zh: 我真的怀疑 我负担不起

translation.en: -I cannot afford that. -You're going to get into RISD.
translation.zh: 我真的怀疑 我负担不起 你会被罗德岛设计学院录取

translation.en: -No. -And you could just get a scholarship.
translation.zh: -不-你可以拿到奖学金

translation.en: Skylar, Jesus, just give it up.
translation.zh: 斯凯勒 天啊 放弃吧

translation.en: This is-- You can't fix everything.
translation.zh: 这是…你不能解决所有问题

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: Your parents' marriage and me.
translation.zh: 你父母的婚姻和我

translation.en: Some things are just beyond repair. Is that why you won't say you love me?
translation.zh: -有些东西是无法修复的-所以你才不说你爱我吗？

translation.en: Because you're… beyond repair.
translation.zh: 因为你无法修复？

translation.en: That's…
translation.zh: -好-那个…

translation.en: -[machinery rattling] -[chattering on screen]
translation.zh: 布勒？

translation.en: Hey, 8:00. I'm here like you asked. What's up?
translation.zh: 嘿 八点钟我按你的要求来了 怎么了？

translation.en: I would like to take your portrait.
translation.zh: 我想给你拍照

translation.en: Uh… can I change first? No, you don't have to. You can just put that on.
translation.zh: -哦 我可以先换衣服吗？-不 你把那个穿上就好

translation.en: What's that?
translation.zh: 这是什么衣服？

translation.en: It was my mom's.
translation.zh: 是我妈妈的衣服

translation.en: This really brings me back to college.
translation.zh: 让我觉得回到了大学时代

translation.en: I had a boyfriend who was an art major. Made me pose for him.
translation.zh: 我曾经有个艺术系的男朋友 他要求我为他的创作摆姿势

translation.en: So… Mel isn't the first person that you've been in love with.
translation.zh: 所以梅尔不是你的初恋吗？

translation.en: Gosh, no. I've loved a few men.
translation.zh: 天啊 不是 我之前爱过几个男人

translation.en: Maybe even one woman.
translation.zh: 也许甚至有一位女人

translation.en: Did you love any of them more than they loved you?
translation.zh: 比起他们爱你 你有没有更爱他们？

translation.en: Oh, probably. Didn't that scare you?
translation.zh: -哦 有可能-那没有吓到你吗？

translation.en: Knowing that someone could hurt you more than you could hurt them?
translation.zh: 知道有人能伤害你比你伤害他们更深？

translation.en: Yeah. Maybe at first.
translation.zh: 是啊 也许吧 刚开始

translation.en: But then I think I realized if you protect yourself from the lows,
translation.zh: 但然后我意识到如果你保护自己免受伤害

translation.en: you just end up missing all the highs too.
translation.zh: 到最后你也失去了所有的欢乐

translation.en: You love Skylar. Don't you?
translation.zh: 你爱斯凯勒 是不是？

translation.en: I think I'm screwing it up.
translation.zh: 我觉得我搞砸了

translation.en: Yeah. If it's not opening old wounds, it's probably not true love.
translation.zh: 是啊 如果不揭开旧伤疤那可能不是真爱

translation.en: I just don't know what to do.
translation.zh: 我不知道该怎么办

translation.en: How do I get Skylar to understand that…
translation.zh: 我怎么才能让斯凯勒明白…

translation.en: I love him. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 我爱他？

translation.en: You start by saying it.
translation.zh: 你可以从说出来开始

translation.en: You need to hear the words, Tessa.
translation.zh: 你需要听到这句话

translation.en: You mean, he needs to hear the words.
translation.zh: 你是说他需要听到这句话

translation.en: No. You need to hear yourself say them.
translation.zh: 不 你需要听到自己说这句话

translation.en: Out loud.
translation.zh: 大声说出来

translation.en: So the world knows your feelings count.
translation.zh: 让全世界知道你的感情是认真的

translation.en: That you count.
translation.zh: 你是认真的

translation.en: Vickie, I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 薇琪 对不起…

translation.en: For how I've treated you.
translation.zh: 我以前那样对你

translation.en: Hey, Google, dim the lights.
translation.zh: 嘿 谷歌 调暗灯光

translation.en: -Yes! -Oh, man. No smoke machine?
translation.zh: -好啊-天啊 没有烟雾机吗？

translation.en: We begin this invocation
translation.zh: 开始这个祈祷前

translation.en: by asking the Archangel Michael
translation.zh: 我们先请求大天使米迦勒保护我们

translation.en: to protect us from any malevolent spirits that may be seeking a gateway into this earthbound sphere.
translation.zh: 不受任何正在寻找阳间入口的恶灵的伤害

translation.en: You wrote this?
translation.zh: 这是你写的？

translation.en: -You're interrupting my invocation. -I'm sorry!
translation.zh: -你在打断祈祷-抱歉

translation.en: It's just-- This is crazy. Did you read all of these books in two days?
translation.zh: 太疯狂了你在两天内读完了这些书？

translation.en: Bitch, yes! You know speed reading is my super power.
translation.zh: 姐妹 是的你知道快速阅读是我的超能力

translation.en: Enjoy Your Own Funeral.
translation.zh: 《享受你自己的葬礼》

translation.en: Yeah. That happens to be a classic
translation.zh: 是啊 它恰好是超自然形而上学流派的经典之作

translation.en: of the paranormal metaphysical genre.
translation.zh: 它恰好是超自然形而上学流派的经典之作

translation.en: -Now hush. -Okay.
translation.zh: -现在安静-好

translation.en: We seek to communicate
translation.zh: 我们只想与生前叫做斯凯勒·亚当斯的灵魂

translation.en: only with the disembodied spirit formerly known as Skylar Adams.
translation.zh: 我们只想与生前叫做斯凯勒·亚当斯的灵魂 进行沟通

translation.en: No other spirits, please.
translation.zh: 其他灵魂请退散

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: -A Ouija board? -Please, Tess. This is a planchette.
translation.zh: -通灵板？-拜托 泰丝 这是占卜板

translation.en: There's a pencil tip attached to the bottom.
translation.zh: 底部有一个铅笔头

translation.en: We ask questions and Skylar communicates by moving our hands.
translation.zh: 我们问问题 斯凯勒移动我们的手跟我们沟通

translation.en: Just like he did in the gym. Here. Fingers right there.
translation.zh: 就像考试时候那样这里 手指放这里

translation.en: Okay. Close your eyes.
translation.zh: 好的 闭上双眼

translation.en: -[gasps] Oh, my God, it moved. -Sorry. That was me. My bad.
translation.zh: 天呐 它动了 抱歉 那是我 我的错

translation.en: It's called scrying. The deceased use the mirror
translation.zh: 这叫镜子占卜 死者把镜子当作通向活人世界的入口

translation.en: as a gateway to the world of the living.
translation.zh: 死者把镜子当作通向活人世界的入口

translation.en: All you have to do is stare into the mirror in a trance-like state.
translation.zh: 你只要用发呆地眼神盯着镜子

translation.en: -That's it. -Okay.
translation.zh: -就可以-好

translation.en: Yeah, I'm sorry. Can we cover up Gambino and Drake?
translation.zh: 嗯 对不起我们能把甘比诺和德雷克盖上吗？

translation.en: They're like really distracting me.
translation.zh: 他们让我分心

translation.en: Instrumental Trans-Communication.
translation.zh: 仪器通灵

translation.en: The spirit uses the TV monitor as a bridge to our world.
translation.zh: 灵魂用电视屏幕作为通往我们世界的桥梁

translation.en: -What is this? Okay. -Here you go.
translation.zh: -给你-这有必要吗？

translation.en: Blocks out the gamma rays.
translation.zh: 有必要 遮挡伽马射线

translation.en: Do you see anything? No. Do you?
translation.zh: -你看到什么了吗？-没有 你呢？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 没有

translation.en: Maybe I should have read more books.
translation.zh: 也许我应该多读几本书

translation.en: No. No, you've been awesome.
translation.zh: 不 你已经很厉害了

translation.en: [sighs] Oh, man. It's just Vickie.
translation.zh: 天啊 是薇琪

translation.en: Needs the car. She has a shift.
translation.zh: 需要用车 她要去上班

translation.en: Okay. I'll walk you out.
translation.zh: 好 到时我去接你

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: -[electric warbling] -[voice murmuring]
translation.zh: 路线正在计算中

translation.en: Hello?
translation.zh: 喂？

translation.en: [GPS] Your route is being calculated.
translation.zh: 路线正在计算中

translation.en: Proceed for four miles to the entrance to Highway 85 South.
translation.zh: 继续前进6.4公里到达85号高速路南线入口

translation.en: -It's a map. -[door opens, closes]
translation.zh: 这是一张地图

translation.en: Tessa? Tessa!
translation.zh: 泰莎

translation.en: Sorry! I've gotta do this.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我需要用车

translation.en: Tessa!
translation.zh: 泰莎

translation.en: [GPS] Head southwest to I-95 South and proceed for 106 miles.
translation.zh: 往西南方向驶入95号州际公路然后继续行驶170公里

translation.en: Continue straight for six miles.
translation.zh: 继续直行10公里

translation.en: [GPS] Take the next right, and in 100 feet,
translation.zh: 在下一个路口左转 然后前进30米

translation.en: your destination will be on your right.
translation.zh: 您的目的地在右边

translation.en: [GPS] You have arrived at your destination.
translation.zh: 您已到达目的地

translation.en: I told you he wasn't gone yet.
translation.zh: 我告诉过你他还没走

translation.en: [laughs] Doris!
translation.zh: 桃丽丝

translation.en: [chuckles] Come. Sit.
translation.zh: 来 坐

translation.en: You know, I love coming out here at night to watch the shooting stars.
translation.zh: 我喜欢晚上出来看流星

translation.en: My angels are calling me home.
translation.zh: 我的天使在召唤我回家

translation.en: Skylar knows the end is near.
translation.zh: 斯凯勒知道马上就要结束了

translation.en: You don't have much time.
translation.zh: 你的时间不多了

translation.en: He's been communicating with you?
translation.zh: 他一直在和你联系吗？

translation.en: Well, I'm much closer to his world than you are.
translation.zh: 比起你我离他的世界更近

translation.en: What does he want?
translation.zh: 他想要什么？

translation.en: My help.
translation.zh: 我的帮助

translation.en: To bring the two of you together.
translation.zh: 让你们两个相聚

translation.en: Can you?
translation.zh: 你可以吗？

translation.en: Please.
translation.zh: 求你了

translation.en: In ancient folklore, the souls of the departed
translation.zh: 在古代的民间传说中 死者的灵魂会回到

translation.en: returned to places where they experienced their greatest moments of love.
translation.zh: 死者的灵魂会回到 体验过最强烈爱意的地方

translation.en: That's where they were able to cross the life-death barrier.
translation.zh: 在那里他们能够跨越生死线

translation.en: Now, perhaps if you and Skylar went back
translation.zh: 现在有可能 如果你和斯凯勒回到

translation.en: to where you felt the most love,
translation.zh: 你们感受过最强烈爱意的地方

translation.en: the window between worlds might open.
translation.zh: 生死世界之间的窗户可能会打开

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: But be careful.
translation.zh: 但要小心

translation.en: If you do manage to cross the barrier…
translation.zh: 如果你真的跨越了那条界限

translation.en: there may be no way back.
translation.zh: 可能再也回不来了

translation.en: -[hip-hop music playing over speakers] -[teenagers laughing, chattering]

translation.en: Tess? What's up?

translation.en: Oh, no, what do you mean? What's wrong?

translation.en: -Oh. Is that Judd? -[Shannon] That's Judd.

translation.en: -Oh… -My vagina is weeping.

translation.en: They are cute, but I'm so sorry.

translation.en: That's terrible. -Oh, my God! -What?

translation.en: [sighs] It's just three words.

translation.en: Hi.

translation.en: -Sure. -[both chuckle]

translation.en: -Yo, brutha! -Hey.

translation.en: -Um… -Oregon State!

translation.en: -Nothing's official yet. -Oh, bullshit, bro.

translation.en: Come on.

translation.en: -Um… -Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: -Tess, I was gonna tell you, I swear. -When?

translation.en: When were you gonna tell me? After I got into RISD? No, of course not.

translation.en: I just didn't want to give you another reason to back out.

translation.en: What about our plan?

translation.en: The same city? No more ticking clock?

translation.en: You weren't even gonna send in an application.

translation.en: I applied last week.

translation.en: Well, thank you for waiting until the last possible moment to tell me.
translation.zh: 谢谢你等到最后一刻告诉我

translation.en: He's not doing that well.

translation.en: He's really lonely in Oregon and I feel like I should stay with him for a while.

translation.en: Oregon is on the other side of the country.

translation.en: -How were we ever gonna see each other? -It'll be hard.

translation.en: I'm not switching schools permanently. I'm not!

translation.en: And if you get into RISD, and you will,

translation.en: I'll be in Providence before you are.

translation.en: What happens if you start to like Oregon? What happens if your team starts to win?
translation.zh: 如果你开始喜欢俄勒冈或你的队伍开始赢了呢？

translation.en: Tess, my dad needs me right now.

translation.en: He's my family. I don't--

translation.en: [exhales] You don't understand about family because--

translation.en: Because I don't have one.

translation.en: That is not what I meant to say.

translation.en: I knew this was gonna happen.

translation.en: I get close to people and they disappear on me.

translation.en: This is just what happens to me.

translation.en: -Tess. -No.
translation.zh: 不要

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不要

translation.en: You're just gonna push me away like you do everyone?

translation.en: And so are we.

translation.en: Yeah, this is full spectrum, motion sensor, night vision.

translation.en: Perfect. Thank you.
translation.zh: 运动传感器 夜视功能 完美 谢谢

translation.en: Bye.

translation.en: You Tessa Benson?

translation.en: The day you stole Vickie's credit card

translation.en: was the day you gave up your right to privacy.

translation.en: -What were you doing at the hotel so late? -I was taking photos.

translation.en: I told you that. Are you trying to put yourself back in hospital?

translation.en: I don't understand this. Things were so much better this summer.

translation.en: -We started to feel like a family. -Do you not understand?

translation.en: Geez, I wonder what happened at the end of the summer that might change my mood.

translation.en: Do you know what we've been through?

translation.en: -Stop. -Love hurts. You learn to live with it.

translation.en: Fuck off, Mel.
translation.zh: -你要学会去接受-滚开 梅尔

translation.en: Hey, no! You don't get to talk to him like that.
translation.zh: 不 你不能这样跟他说话

translation.en: -Not after everything he's done for you. -There's no…

translation.en: Tessa!

translation.en: Is it any wonder? The way she's been running around all crazy.

translation.en: You can see right here

translation.en: there is a fair amount of blood accumulated around her heart.

translation.en: -Will she be all right? -Not until we drain the chamber

translation.en: and reinforce the original suture.

translation.en: You don't understand. You don't understand.

translation.en: -Get some rest now, honey. -I never got to tell… tell him.

translation.en: Tell him what?

translation.en: That…

translation.en: They can never, ever tear us apart.

translation.en: -I'm at the hospital. -What happened?

translation.en: Whoa.

translation.en: -you take evens. -Yeah.

translation.en: -Whoa. -Let's go.

translation.en: I could get used to this.

translation.en: Oh, God.

translation.en: The lake is that way. You've gotta turn around.

translation.en: -Let go. -What?

translation.en: Let go!

translation.en: I want a dead boyfriend too.

translation.en: What are you doing here?

translation.en: Shannon, my past is always just gonna get in the way.

translation.en: and just had to get a photo.

translation.en: You had to jump into the water,
translation.zh: 尽管水冷刺骨

translation.en: even though it was freezing cold.

translation.en: You know what I was thinking

translation.en: when I saw you down there swimming against the current to get your photo?

translation.en: "Imagine if Tess could be like this for her life, and not just for her art."

translation.en: This is where the accident happened.

translation.en: Do you know why he brought you here?

translation.en: No. I don't know.
translation.zh: 不 我不知道

translation.en: But I'm gonna find out.
translation.zh: 但我会找出来的

translation.en: Tess?
translation.zh: 泰丝？

translation.en: Tess!
translation.zh: 泰丝？

translation.en: Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 我的天啊

translation.en: I need help!

translation.en: [dispatcher] 911, what's your emergency?

translation.en: [Shannon] My friend just passed out. She has a heart condition.

translation.en: I'm at the corner of 6th and Channel. Please send somebody!

translation.en: [Tessa] Skylar!

translation.en: Tess.
translation.zh: 泰丝

translation.en: I'm sorry. I'm…

translation.en: [sighs] I should have talked to you before making any decisions.

translation.en: No. You shouldn't have to explain loving your family.

translation.en: If I hadn't spent my whole life just pushing everyone away,

translation.en: I would have understood that.
translation.zh: 我就会理解

translation.en: -No, come on, Tess. -I love you.

translation.en: I said it.
translation.zh: 我说出来了

translation.en: Would you mind if I said it again?

translation.en: I love you.
translation.zh: 我爱你

translation.en: -[horn honking] -[Tessa screams]
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: -[Skylar] Hey. -[gasps]

translation.en: -It's you. -It's me.
translation.zh: -是你-是我

translation.en: Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 我的天啊

translation.en: -I love you. -I know.
translation.zh: -我爱你-我知道

translation.en: You told me. I love you.
translation.zh: 你告诉过我了 我爱你

translation.en: So that's why you brought me here?
translation.zh: 所以你才带我来这里？

translation.en: So that I'd know?
translation.zh: 这样我才能知道？

translation.en: Yeah. No regrets.

translation.en: So, is this…

translation.en: Is this it? We're still in Avalon.
translation.zh: 就这样了吗？我们还在阿瓦隆？

translation.en: Not exactly. It's like everything you see is a memory,

translation.en: a dream that we have that's just projected onto the world.
translation.zh: 我们做的一个梦投射到这个世界中

translation.en: It's kinda cool.

translation.en: Come on. I'll show you. Okay.

translation.en: [Shannon] Wait, wait.
translation.zh: 等等 她会没事吗？

translation.en: [speaking French] Oh, my God. It's incredible!

translation.en: Wait a minute! I'm speaking English, but it's coming out as French.
translation.zh: 等等 我在说英语但出来变成了法语

translation.en: [speaking French] Your pronunciation is not bad.
translation.zh: 你的发音还不错

translation.en: Can I tweak it a little? Be my guest.
translation.zh: -我能稍微调整一下吗？-请随意

translation.en: Aren't you forgetting something?

translation.en: Can I really? Try it.
translation.zh: -我真的可以吗？-试试看

translation.en: I bet you wish you had your camera.
translation.zh: 我敢说你一定希望手中有台相机

translation.en: Not even for a second.
translation.zh: 完全没想过

translation.en: I came out here the first day I met you.
translation.zh: 我认识你的第一天就来过这里

translation.en: My parents had just told me about the separation.
translation.zh: 我的父母跟我说了分居的事

translation.en: Felt like it was the worst day of my life.
translation.zh: 我觉得那是我人生中最糟糕的一天

translation.en: And then I met you.
translation.zh: 然后我遇见了你

translation.en: And it was probably the best day of my life.
translation.zh: 那是我人生中最美好的一天

translation.en: Mine too.
translation.zh: 也是我的

translation.en: [Dr. Sarkisian] There's nothing more we can do. She has a decision to make.
translation.zh: 我们已经无能为力 她必须做出决定 她必须想要活下来

translation.en: She has to want to live.
translation.zh: 她必须做出决定 她必须想要活下来

translation.en: Come back, Tess. Come back, Tess…
translation.zh: 回来 泰丝

translation.en: What's wrong?
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: I've spent my whole life learning how not to get hurt.
translation.zh: 我一辈子都在学习如何不受伤害

translation.en: And that's no way to live.
translation.zh: 那样根本不是生活

translation.en: But… But even with all the hurt that I feel right now…
translation.zh: 但即便我现在感觉到了伤痛…

translation.en: I don't regret a thing.
translation.zh: 我也不后悔

translation.en: Because I love you.
translation.zh: 因为我爱你

translation.en: And knowing that I'm capable of feeling this way
translation.zh: 知道我可以有这种感觉

translation.en: makes life worth living.
translation.zh: 让我觉得活着是值得的

translation.en: I don't want to say goodbye.
translation.zh: 我不想说再见

translation.en: You don't have to.
translation.zh: 你不用说的

translation.en: Love never dies.

translation.en: I'm gonna miss you.
translation.zh: 我会想你的

translation.en: [sobbing] I'm gonna miss you.
translation.zh: 我会想你的

translation.en: Go give us a happy ending, yeah?
translation.zh: 去让我们有个大团圆结局 好吗？

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: No more dying, okay?
translation.zh: 不要再死了 好吗？

translation.en: Oh, my God. It smells so good.
translation.zh: -天啊 好香-坐下 有很多

translation.en: -Sit down. There's plenty. -I can't. I gotta go.
translation.zh: -天啊 好香-坐下 有很多 不行 我得走了

translation.en: -Good luck, Tessa. -Love you.
translation.zh: -祝你好运 泰莎-爱你

translation.en: -Go get 'em. -All right, bye.
translation.zh: -拿下他们-好的 再见

translation.en: See you later!
translation.zh: 回头见

translation.en: [Tessa] Ever since I was a little girl,
translation.zh: 从我小时候起 别人就一直告诉我

translation.en: people always told me that I see things that no one else does.
translation.zh: 从我小时候起 别人就一直告诉我 我能看见别人看不见的东西

translation.en: It wasn't just that my camera was a way for me to express myself.
translation.zh: 不仅仅因为相机是我表达自己的方式

translation.en: It was the means by which I captured the unseen.
translation.zh: 它也是我捕捉看不见的东西的工具

translation.en: It was only recently that I discovered something that I had been blind to.
translation.zh: 直到最近我发现了我一直熟视无睹的东西

translation.en: A ghost.
translation.zh: 鬼魂

translation.en: All of us, each and every one of us, are haunted by ghosts.
translation.zh: 我们所有人 每一个人都被鬼魂缠身

translation.en: The ghosts of childhood trauma.
translation.zh: 童年创伤的鬼魂

translation.en: The ghosts of unfulfilled dreams.
translation.zh: 未完成梦想的鬼魂

translation.en: The ghosts of lost love.
translation.zh: 失恋的鬼魂

translation.en: Like so many people, I believed that if I just ignored these ghosts,
translation.zh: 就像很多人一样我相信如果我不理这些鬼魂

translation.en: they would eventually go away.
translation.zh: 最终它们都会走开

translation.en: This turned out to be a mistake.
translation.zh: 事实证明这是个错误

translation.en: Just like all of our worst fears,
translation.zh: 就像我们所有最深层的恐惧

translation.en: these invisible spirits gain strength in darkness.
translation.zh: 这些看不见的鬼魂在黑暗中获得了力量

translation.en: If we run from them, they run faster.
translation.zh: 如果我们逃离它们它们会加快速度追赶我们

translation.en: If we push them away, they just push back harder.
translation.zh: 如果我们把它们推开它们会更用力地推回来

translation.en: What are we supposed to do?
translation.zh: 我们应该怎么做？

translation.en: It has taken…
translation.zh: 为了找到

translation.en: great personal loss
translation.zh: 这个问题的答案

translation.en: for me to discover the answer to this question.
translation.zh: 我付出了惨痛的个人损失

translation.en: We must attend to our ghosts.
translation.zh: 我们必须关心我们的鬼魂

translation.en: We must welcome them into our lives
translation.zh: 我们必须欢迎它们进入我们的生活

translation.en: as though they are part of us, because they are part of us.
translation.zh: 好像它们是我们的一部分因为它们就是我们的一部分

translation.en: It's only when we acknowledge their presence will they make room for new possibilities.
translation.zh: 只有我们承认它们的存在它们才会为新的可能性腾出空间

translation.en: In the end, I've learned that our ghosts are part of who we are,
translation.zh: 最后我明白了我们的鬼魂是我们的一部分

translation.en: part of who we hope to be.
translation.zh: 也是我们希望成为的一部分

translation.en: These hauntings stay inside us,
translation.zh: 这些鬼魂就住在我们体内

translation.en: tethered to our hearts forever.
translation.zh: 与我们的心永远相连

translation.en: In life.
translation.zh: 在生的时候…

translation.en: In death.
translation.zh: 死的时候

translation.en: And… everywhere in-between.
translation.zh: 以及生死之间的各个地方
